content.text: Hello!  what's your favorite kind of music?
I like a lot of different types of music, but my favorite is probably alternative.
I like alternative too!  what's your favorite band?
I like a lot of bands, but my favorites are probably Radiohead, Sigur Rós, and The National.
I like all of those bands!  I've seen Radiohead live a couple of times.
I'm so jealous!  I've never seen them live.
They're amazing live!  I'm sure you'll get to see them one day.
I hope so!  What's your favorite song by any of those bands?
It's hard to choose, but I think my favorite Radiohead song is "No Surprises."
That's a great song!  My favorite Sigur Rós song is "Svefn-g-englar."
That's a beautiful song.  My favorite The National song is "About Today."
That's a great song too!  I love their lyrics.
I'm glad we have similar taste in music!
Me too!  It's always nice to find someone who appreciates the same music.
